hero.text: Here, words dance and confide, embracing in the secret of hearts.

about.text1: ...every word is a sigh from the heart, whispering the truth of emotions. Here, the writings become the echo of our dreams, the expression of our secret joys and silent sorrows, woven into the very fabric of existence.
about.text2: On these pages, every poem, every thought, is an offering: a fragment of the soul shared in the hope of touching another's. This is a space where writing is a song, a whispered prayer to the universe, an embrace between the ephemeral and the eternal.
about.text3: When you lay down your words, know that they become seeds sown in the garden of souls, ready to sprout, to comfort, and, I hope, to awaken. For in the beauty of the present moment, even the softest whisper can become a symphony of resonance.
about.text4: Let life write through you. Every word is a delicate thread woven between light and shadow, where the tangible brushes against the immaterial, between solitude and communion. And remember, every shared embrace, even fleeting, makes us a little more human, a little more alive...
